page.title: 20ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS,S.HED.
page.content: The information for this survey was collected by{Class 2 of St.Peter's {Church of England Primary School Sible {Hedingham}led by their teacher Mrs. S Bennett. They were greatly helped by the following parents:Mesdames Beard, Deal,Lidford,Merry,Metcalfe,Nolan, Oakey,Playle,Radley and especially Mrs. Thorogood who supervised the computer work. The work was displayed in an exhibition from which the necessary information was gathered for the computer pages. Although the 12 kilometer squares are south of the centre of the village the information is about Sible Hedingham thanks to the co-operation of De Vere School Castle Hedingham who were allocated the squares covering the village.
